title: Autism football club helped rekindle my Premiership dream
content: This video can not be playedCharlie struggled to fit in at other clubs until he started playing for autism-friendly football club Team United.He had found it difficult to deal with crowds and coaches shouting at him.Since playing with other footballers with autism, he has grown in confidence and overcome his fears.Charlie is now back playing with Livingston FC under-17s where he first played as a young boy.
